tool_description: Identifies qualified technicians for work orders based on skills, certifications, workload, and location proximity.

required_skills.description: List of required skills for the work order

exclude_technicians.description: List of technician IDs to exclude from matching

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
No qualified technicians: No technicians found matching the skill and certification requirements.
Invalid travel distance: max_travel_distance must be between 1 and 500 kilometers.
Invalid skills list: At least one skill must be specified in required_skills.
Location not found: The specified location_preference is not recognized.
usage: Provide work_order_id, required_skills, and location_preference. Optionally specify certifications, travel distance limits, and technicians to exclude. Returns ranked list of qualified technicians.

matched_technicians.description: List of technician IDs ranked by suitability

match_scores.description: Suitability scores corresponding to each technician (0-100)

availability_status.description: Availability status for each matched technician

total_matches.description: Total number of qualified technicians found
